document.discussion_title: BNP Paribas Reaffirms Neutral Rating for ARM Holdings plc (ARM)
document.topic_text: Tweet ARM Holdings plc (LON:ARM) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating restated by equities researchers at BNP Paribas in a note issued to investors on Monday. They presently have a GBX 1,700 ($21.89) price target on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price target indicates a potential upside of 0.71% from the stock’s previous close. ARM has been the topic of a number of other reports. Kepler Capital Markets raised their price objective on shares of ARM Holdings plc from GBX 1,100 ($14.16) to GBX 1,150 ($14.81) and gave the company a “buy” rating in a research note on Friday, June 3rd. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. reaffirmed a “conviction-buy” rating and issued a GBX 1,400 ($18.03) price objective on shares of ARM Holdings plc in a research note on Wednesday, May 4th. Deutsche Bank AG reaffirmed a “hold” rating and issued a GBX 1,150 ($14.81) price objective on shares of ARM Holdings plc in a research note on Tuesday, July 19th. Numis Securities Ltd lowered shares of ARM Holdings plc to a “hold” rating and set a GBX 1,700 ($21.89) price objective on the stock. in a research note on Monday, July 18th. Finally, Liberum Capital reaffirmed a “sell” rating and issued a GBX 650 ($8.37) price objective on shares of ARM Holdings plc in a research note on Wednesday, May 18th. Two investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, thirteen have assigned a hold rating and nine have assigned a buy rating to the company. The stock currently has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of GBX 1,298.96 ($16.73). ARM Holdings plc ( LON:ARM ) opened at 1691.00 on Monday. The firm has a 50-day moving average of GBX 1,531.91 and a 200-day moving average of GBX 1,116.91. The company’s market capitalization is GBX 23.81 billion. ARM Holdings plc has a 52 week low of GBX 812.00 and a 52 week high of GBX 1,752.00. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/bnp-paribas-reaffirms-neutral-rating-for-arm-holdings-plc-arm/ The business also recently announced a dividend, which will be paid on Monday, October 10th. Shareholders of record on Thursday, September 8th will be given a dividend of GBX 3.78 ($0.05) per share. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, September 8th. This represents a yield of 0.23%. ARM Holdings plc (ARM) is a company engaged in designing a range of inter-related intellectual property (IP), including microprocessors, Physical IP, and supporting software and tools. Its product offering includes 16/32/64-bit reduced instruction set computing (RISC) microprocessors, data engines, graphics processors, digital libraries, embedded memories, peripherals, software and development tools, as well as analog functions and high-speed connectivity products. Receive News & Ratings for ARM Holdings plc ARM Holdings plc
